text: Ojo onon rahmati Parvardigoratro taqsim mekunand?, (Ja'ne, pajomʙariro), hol on ki mo maisati ruzguzaronii onhoro dar in zindagii dunjo mijonason taqsim mekunem. Va ʙa'zero ʙa martaʙa ʙolotar az ʙa'ze digar qaror dodem, to ʙa'ze ʙa'zi digarro ʙa xidmat girand. Va rahmati Parvardigorat (ja'ne, daromadanason ʙa cannat) az on ci onho cam' meovarand az moli dunjo, ʙehtar ast
